AddFunctionalityDialog.title: Add New Functionality
AddFunctionalityDialog.description: Describe the functionality, provide justification, and set its initial priority.
AddFunctionalityDialog.errorToastDescription: Could not add the functionality or log the change. Please try again.

MoveConfirmationDialog.title: Confirm Move
MoveConfirmationDialog.description: You are moving the functionality "{cardText}" from {currentPriorityLabel} to {newPriorityLabel}. Please provide a justification for this change.
MoveConfirmationDialog.justificationPlaceholder: Explain why this change is being made...
MoveConfirmationDialog.validationErrorMessage: Justification is required to move the card.
MoveConfirmationDialog.errorToastDescription: Could not move the card or log the change. Please try again.
MoveConfirmationDialog.moveErrorFindItem: Could not find the item to move.
MoveConfirmationDialog.moveErrorMissingInfo: Cannot complete the move. Missing required information.

MoscowExplanationDialog.title: What is MoSCoW Prioritization?
MoscowExplanationDialog.description: Imagine you're packing a bag for a trip! MoSCoW helps decide what's most important to bring.
MoscowExplanationDialog.mustDescription:
These are the really important things you absolutely must bring. Like your passport or ticket for a plane trip. Without these, the trip can't happen!
Example: For a drawing app, being able to draw lines.
MoscowExplanationDialog.shouldDescription:
These are important things you should bring if you can. They make the trip much better, but you could maybe manage without them. Like a toothbrush or comfy shoes.
Example: For a drawing app, being able to change colors.
MoscowExplanationDialog.couldDescription:
These are nice things you could bring if there's extra space and time. They aren't essential but add a little extra fun. Like a book or a special snack.
Example: For a drawing app, adding special glittery brushes.
MoscowExplanationDialog.wontDescription:
These are things you decide you won't bring on this trip. Maybe they're too heavy, not needed, or you'll bring them next time. Like bringing your whole toy box.
Example: For a drawing app, maybe adding 3D modeling right now.
MoscowExplanationDialog.summary: Using MoSCoW helps everyone agree on what's most important to build first, just like packing the essentials before the extras!
